object.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1330 (1697 with comment) chars
j=true f=false U=input y=math d=output u=d.setBool v=d.setNumber R=y.abs i=U.getBool k=U.getNumber M={W=function(aj,c)local c=c or{}return{m=c.m or 0,I=c.I or 0,D=c.D or 0,S=c.S or 0,o=c.o or-(1/0),l=c.l or(1/0),T=c.T or 1.0,ag=nil,C=0,Q=0,n=aj.n}end,n=function(_,e,h)local e=e*_.T local g=e-h local K=_.Q+g local an=g-_.C local z=_.m*g+_.I*K+_.D*an+_.S _.C=g local d=y.min(y.max(z,_.o),_.l)if d==z or g*z<=0 then _.Q=K end _.ag={e=e,h=h,d=d}return d end}function ab(h,e)local w=((e%1)-(h%1)+1)%1 return(w>.5)and(w-1)or w end Y=25 ap=30 am=32 N=Y L=N+ap O=L+am p=0 F=1 G=2 H=3 J=4 ak=60 ai=40 V=.001 b=0 a=p t=0 s=-O al=M:W({m=2,o=-1,l=1})ah=M:W({m=10,o=-1,l=1})function onTick()local P=k(1)or 0 local E=k(2)or 0 local af=k(3)or 0 local ae=k(4)or 0 local x=i(1)or f local Z=i(2)or f local aa=i(3)or f local ac=i(4)or f if not ac then return end local aq=al:n(E,P)local A=ab(af,ae)local ao=ah:n(A,0)local q=f local B=f if a==p then if not x then a=F t=b+ak end elseif a==F then q=j if b>=t then s=b a=G end elseif a==G then q=j if Z then a=H t=b+ai end elseif a==H then q=j B=j if b>=t then a=J end elseif a==J then if x then a=p end end local r=-1 if b>=s+O then r=-1 elseif b>=s+L then r=-1 elseif b>=s+N then r=1 end local X=R(E-P)<V and R(A)<V local ad=a==p and x and aa and X v(1,aq)v(2,ao)v(3,r)u(1,ad)u(2,q)u(3,B)b=b+1 end

c2.script:
-- Author: <Authorname> (Please change this in user settings, Ctrl+Comma) -- GitHub: <GithubLink> -- Workshop: <WorkshopLink> -- -- Developed & Minimized using LifeBoatAPI - Stormworks Lua plugin for VSCode -- https://code.visualstudio.com/download (search "Stormworks Lua with LifeboatAPI" extension) -- By Nameous Changey -- Minimized Size: 1330 (1697 with comment) chars
j=true f=false U=input y=math d=output u=d.setBool v=d.setNumber R=y.abs i=U.getBool k=U.getNumber M={W=function(aj,c)local c=c or{}return{m=c.m or 0,I=c.I or 0,D=c.D or 0,S=c.S or 0,o=c.o or-(1/0),l=c.l or(1/0),T=c.T or 1.0,ag=nil,C=0,Q=0,n=aj.n}end,n=function(_,e,h)local e=e*_.T local g=e-h local K=_.Q+g local an=g-_.C local z=_.m*g+_.I*K+_.D*an+_.S _.C=g local d=y.min(y.max(z,_.o),_.l)if d==z or g*z<=0 then _.Q=K end _.ag={e=e,h=h,d=d}return d end}function ab(h,e)local w=((e%1)-(h%1)+1)%1 return(w>.5)and(w-1)or w end Y=25 ap=30 am=32 N=Y L=N+ap O=L+am p=0 F=1 G=2 H=3 J=4 ak=60 ai=40 V=.001 b=0 a=p t=0 s=-O al=M:W({m=2,o=-1,l=1})ah=M:W({m=10,o=-1,l=1})function onTick()local P=k(1)or 0 local E=k(2)or 0 local af=k(3)or 0 local ae=k(4)or 0 local x=i(1)or f local Z=i(2)or f local aa=i(3)or f local ac=i(4)or f if not ac then return end local aq=al:n(E,P)local A=ab(af,ae)local ao=ah:n(A,0)local q=f local B=f if a==p then if not x then a=F t=b+ak end elseif a==F then q=j if b>=t then s=b a=G end elseif a==G then q=j if Z then a=H t=b+ai end elseif a==H then q=j B=j if b>=t then a=J end elseif a==J then if x then a=p end end local r=-1 if b>=s+O then r=-1 elseif b>=s+L then r=-1 elseif b>=s+N then r=1 end local X=R(E-P)<V and R(A)<V local ad=a==p and x and aa and X v(1,aq)v(2,ao)v(3,r)u(1,ad)u(2,q)u(3,B)b=b+1 end
